name: What are the chances app game

description:
What are the chances?

LIMITED TIME FREE DOWNLOAD TODAY!

This is a game best played in a group, that can also be played alone. It is a great party game! Or even if your just at home with friends over. Highly awarded by BEST APP GAMES inc. and very highly recognized with NIGHT GROUP GAMES.
Make your friends do bonker things and have the best night of your lives. Its a twist on of all the truth or dare and never have i ever games but better!
Download and share today!
